alert.note: Alert for Macomb; St. Clair (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 3:39PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Macomb and southeastern St. Clair Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 339 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over New Baltimore, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Harsens Island around 355 PM EDT. Algonac and Marine City around 400 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Anchorville, Pearl Beach, Chesterfield Township, New Haven and Fair Haven. People attending Algonac Waterfront Park should seek safe shelter immediately! MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
